channel.title: fusion on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in fusion on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-14
item.description: New MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro with M2 coming later this year (3 minute read) New MacBooks with the M2 chip are coming later this year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Apple will reportedly allow iPhones to accept contactless payments (2 minute read) Apple may soon be rolling out a feature that will let small businesses accept payments using their iPhones without any extra hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-19
item.description: Facebook releases a report on the most-viewed content in News Feed (3 minute read) Facebook has released a report that shows what content was most widely viewed by Americans between April and June.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-29
item.description: Google is testing Memory, an upgrade for Assistant to ‘save and find everything’ (2 minute read) Memory is a new feature for Google Assistant that uses a digital locker to store things like to-do lists, notes, reading lists, images, and more.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-22
item.description: Microsoft purchases Bethesda Softworks in industry-changing acquisition (3 minute read) Microsoft has announced that it is buying the corporate parents of Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax Media.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.
